name: Levi's Men's 511 Slim Fit Jean
description: Levi's Men's 511 Slim Fit Jean is designed for a modern look, featuring a slim-cut denim pant. It's suitable for everyday wear with its comfortable and durable material.

name: Apple AirPods
description: Quick access to Siri by saying “Hey Siri” More than 24 hours of total listening time with Charging Case Effortless setup, in-ear detection and auto-switching features for a magical experience

name: 1984 by George Orwell
description: 1984 by George Orwell is a classic dystopian novel set in a future where individual freedom is restricted. It offers a compelling analysis of mind control and societal manipulation.

name: Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Electric Pressure Cooker
description: The Instant Pot Duo 7-in-1 Electric Pressure Cooker offers seven different functions in one: pressure cooking, slow cooking, rice cooking, steaming, yogurt making, sautéing/ searing, and keeping warm. It saves time in the kitchen and allows you to easily prepare various meals.
